message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"to love or like","sentence":"我爱妈妈。","image_prompt":"A young child hugs their mother with a big smile in a gentle soft apocalypse animation style. Subtle hints of a changed world—crumbling buildings with flowers growing through, beams of soft light illuminating the warm, loving scene. The mother kneels down to embrace the child, both showing clear expressions of love and joy.","sentence_translation":"I love mom."}
